quotes.quote: Dirt is matter in the wrong place.
All that matters is love and work.
Truth is a matter of the imagination.
Matter is plastic in the face of Mind.
What matters is how well we have loved.
Strength is a matter of the made-up mind.
It matters not how long we live but how.
Knowledge counts but common sense matters.
What matters is how many times you get up.
The things that matter most are not things.
Be true to what matters most to your heart.
What matters is that you never stop trying.
If nothing matters, there's nothing to save.
What matters is who we are, not who we beat.
What matters is giving over to what you love.
How you think matters. How you act matters more.
Matter is spirit reduced to point of visibility.
Friends and family matter most during hard times.
What we know matters but who we are matters more.
A matter that becomes clear ceases to concern us.
Matter is spirit moving slowly enough to be seen.
How hard you work matters more than how much you make.
Think most of what matters. Think less of what doesn't.
Dreams Matter because they push you.
Everything matters. Time is precious.
What matters is the imaginative truth.
Life is a matter of really tough choices.
Concentrate on the things that matter to you.
What matters the most is what you do for free.
Everything matters, but nothing matters very much.
